response.overview: NADA follows three Mexican siblings -Felix, Memo, and Mariana- as they navigate an unexpected, transformative day in New York City. Each sibling faces personal challenges that test their beliefs and aspirations: Felix questions his approach to relationships, Memo grapples with doubts about his future as a writer, and Mariana confronts a startling new reality. Along the way, they meet a range of colorful characters and encounter surreal moments that push them to reflect on who they are. Through the highs and lows of their experiences, they ultimately find strength in each other amidst the city's chaos. The story touches on themes of family dynamics, personal growth, disillusionment, and the randomness of life.
response.title: NADA
